title: Off to Osaka - Food Capital! 🚄
summary: Today I'm traveling to Osaka, Japan's kitchen! The short Shinkansen ride will be exciting, and I can't wait to experience Osaka's incredible energy. Osaka Castle and my first evening in Dotonbori are going to be amazing - I've been dreaming about those neon lights!

activities.description: Shinkansen from Nagoya to Osaka (1 hour)
Check in and visit Osaka Castle

images.caption: 🏰 Osaka Castle - can't wait to see it!

highlight: My first taste of authentic takoyaki from a street vendor and seeing Dotonbori's famous neon signs come alive at night! 🐙
